briefTitle: Cosmetic Outcome, Patient-reported Outcomes, and Reconstruction-related Complications in Breast Cancer Women Treated With or Without Post-mastectomy Radiation Therapy
officialTitle: Cosmetic Outcome, Patient-reported Outcomes, and Reconstruction-related Complications in Breast Cancer Women Treated With or Without Post-mastectomy Radiation Therapy: Prospective Cohort Study
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Change from baseline of Breast-Q questionnaire score
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Pathologically confirmed invasive breast carcinoma
* Women who underwent mastectomy and breast reconstruction
* Good performance status (ECOG 0-1)

Exclusion Criteria:

* Recurrent breast cancer
* History of ipsilateral breast irradiation
